page.title: 11EDUCATION (CONT)
page.content: schools are local authority schools for boys and girls where children are taught in unstreamed classes. At 12+ the children commence secondary edacation at CAMPSMOUNT SCHOOL (Headmaster Mr. P.G.Stevens) which is a 12 to 18 comprehensive school. All children must remain at school until they are 16 and most take examinations at either C.S.E. or G.C.E.level.There is 6th Form study available for those wishing to study for higher examinations. There are currently 764 on roll at Campsmount. Opportunities for further and adult education is provided either at the schools where both vocational and non- voctional courses are run or at various colleges under the auspices of the Doncaster Institute of Higher Education.Those suitably qualified can proceed to university or polytechnic.
